articles.author: Kat Stafford, Bianca Flowers, Evan Garcia
articles.description: Shareeduh McGee is fighting to keep the memory of her cousin George Floyd alive.
articles.title: Five years after George Floyd's murder, racial justice push continues

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Hamas has agreed to a proposal by U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff for a Gaza ceasefire, a Palestinian official close to the group told Reuters, paving the way for a possible end to the war.
articles.title: Hamas agrees to U.S. proposal on Gaza ceasefire, Palestinian official says

articles.author: Guy Faulconbridge, Tom Balmforth
articles.description: President Donald Trump said Vladimir Putin had "gone absolutely CRAZY" by unleashing the largest aerial attack of the war on Ukraine and said he was considering more sanctions on Moscow, but he also scolded Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.
articles.title: Trump says Putin has 'gone absolutely CRAZY', considering more sanctions on Russia

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Iran will not accept temporarily suspending uranium enrichment to secure a nuclear deal with U.S., a Foreign Ministry spokesperson said on Monday, adding no date had yet been set for a sixth round of talks with Washington.
articles.title: Iran will not temporarily suspend enrichment to secure nuclear deal with U.S.

articles.author: Alexander Cornwell
articles.description: The demonstrators shouted nationalistic slogans and called for violence against Palestinians.
articles.title: Far-right Israelis confront Palestinians, other Israelis in chaotic Jerusalem march, witnesses say

articles.author: Michael Holden, David Ljunggren
articles.description: King Charles flies to Canada on Monday for a highly symbolic visit showing support for the nation that recognises him as its sovereign but is coveted by U.S. President Donald Trump as a 51st U.S. state.
articles.title: King Charles heads to Canada in show of support for realm eyed by Trump

articles.author: Jun Yong, Greg Torode
articles.description: Uncertainties over the Trump administration's security policies in Asia and Europe, the protracted war in Ukraine as well as fresh India-Pakistan tensions are likely to dominate Asia's leading defence meeting in Singapore later this week.
articles.title: Uncertainties over Trump, Ukraine loom large ahead of  Asian defence meeting

articles.author: Alexander Cornwell, Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: The head of a U.S.-backed foundation said it could not uphold humanitarian principles amidst war.
articles.title: Head of US-backed Gaza aid foundation quits as further Israeli airstrikes kill dozens

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The majority of supplies of medical equipment have run out in Gaza, while 42% of basic medicines including pain killers are out of stock, the World Health Organization said on Monday.
articles.title: Majority of medical equipment supplies at 'stock zero' in Gaza, WHO says

articles.author: Sybille De La Hamaide
articles.description: French farmers disrupted highway traffic around Paris and rallied in front of parliament with their tractors on Monday, protesting against amendments filed by opposition lawmakers to a bill that would loosen environmental regulations on farming.
articles.title: French farmers bring tractors to Paris to press for looser rules
